localised_description: Forbidden is a word for those who do not have the will to grasp power.
An Ice Drake felled long ago by Greasus Goldtooth, happened upon by Yuwei in exile.
Zombies are terrifying enough, but when they learn how to run, thats when everyone is in trouble.
A forbidden right to embrace undeath, to be eternal and leave the bonds of mortality to behind.
Devilish chariots imbued with dark and eldritch power, driving the Undead to greater, more macabre acts.
Infernal flames belch from dismal braziers, permeating the air with fragments of magic-confounding Warpstone.
When the lodestone bell rings, Dark Magic exudes and ripples across the battlefield.
Devilish chariots imbued with dark and eldritch power, driving the Undead to greater, more macabre acts.
Infernal flames belch from dismal braziers, permeating the air with fragments of magic-confounding Warpstone.
When the lodestone bell rings, dark magic exudes and ripples across the battlefield.
It is not just Vampires that can tame a fierce, barded Undead steed - some Necromancers have such power too.
Necromancers may summon a Hellsteed, a winged Nightmare, to take them wherever they wish.
A Necromancer that can summon a Nightmare is no amateur in the black arts.
Skeletal Steeds draped in fine armour make for an impressive and dangerous sight.
